column4: hi guys, here i am again asking for your help again! I need to install a ruby package which is needed for building natively a package through 'gem install ruby-debug-base". I was previously in fedora and this was "ruby-devel". Here in ubuntu, i can't find ruby-devel. Is there a solution to this?
